p: At Code - A Brady Company, we are looking for an exceptionally talented Image Processing Engineer to join our growing technology team. The Image Processing Engineer will participate in new product development as well as improving existing products. Responsibilities include:

li: Design, develop, and test image processing and pattern recognition algorithms
li.1: Implement in C/C++ and optimize for embedded platforms
li.2: Debug, adapt, and improve image processing algorithms to support customer applications
li.3: Enhance image processing development tools under MS Windows using MS Visual Studio
li.4: Develop and maintain software that meets quality system requirements of Code Corporation
li.6: Support porting and testing of algorithms to embedded platforms

li: 2+ years of C/C++ experience related to the image processing algorithm
li.1: Windows Software development experience using MS Visual Studio
li.2: BS/BA in EE, CS, Math or equivalent required. MS preferred
li.3: Experience in image processing, signal detection, and estimation, and pattern recognition
li.5: Ability to work in a team environment
li.6: Must be a self-starter and detail-oriented
li.7: Experience in Linux and/or embedded systems desirable

p.6: Our hybrid work schedule combines on-premise and remote models and creates a unique (and more flexible) environment - one where team members alternate time in the office with a bit of remote work. You will have to live or relocate to the location.
